about.text: Once a fearsome dragon with an illustrious hoard, Smaugustus Emberflame has decided to 'go corporate.' Wielding centuries of treasure-management skills and a keen eye for 'valuable assets,' Smaugustus seeks an honorable position at the bank—where the gold is ample, but he has *absolutely no interest* in adding it to his personal hoard. Not at all.

flat.title: Hire Me (No, Really!)
flat.avatar_alt: a stern yet charming dragon profile picture

items.text: Greetings, mortals! I’m [Smaugustus Emberflame](https://dragonsforhire.com/smaugustus/), an ancient and distinguished dragon with extensive experience managing large 'personal assets' in secure locations, such as deep mountain caves. I’ve spent centuries honing my skills in asset aggregation (by various means), value protection (fire deterrents), and account security (mine’s never been breached). Now, I seek a peaceful, *entirely legal* role safeguarding wealth at the bank. Trust me, I don’t want your gold… well, not all of it.
items.title: Greetings, Humans!

items.text: Over the years, I’ve worked in a variety of fields—from personal treasure management with the [Order of the Golden Hoard](https://goldenhoard.org) to mentoring fledgling dragons on wealth accumulation strategies. Notable partnerships include the [Ancient League of Firebreathers](https://firebreathers.org) and [Vault Keepers Anonymous](https://vaultkeepers.com). I’ve even given talks at DragonCon on 'Managing a Hoard in Modern Times.' I’d like to assure you that I bring those same skills and a reformed perspective to this role. Definitely no fire involved.
items.title: Experienced and... *Reformed*

items.text: [Excel](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/excel) is my primary tool these days—imagine the formulas I can create for compound treasure growth! However, I’m well-versed in modern fintech tools too. When I’m not safeguarding gold (yours or mine), I’m dabbling in data security to ensure assets stay exactly where they belong. I write a regular [column](https://dragonsforhire.com/embers-blog) on wealth management, aimed at *aspiring dragons* and, increasingly, humans.
items.title: Tech and Treasure

items.text: Looking for someone to bring that extra spark to your vault? I can promise unwavering loyalty to your gold storage initiatives and *nearly no interest* in, uh, excessive collection. Besides, having a dragon around will deter any other *less reputable* dragons. Call it free security.
items.title: Unmatched Vault Security

items.text:
Are you planning to expand your vault capacity? If so, I may know a few friends eager to assist. If you're looking for an 'asset growth strategist' who comes with a built-in fire deterrent system, you’ve found your dragon. Let’s chat over a tankard of ale. Email me at [smaugustus@dragonsforhire.com](mailto:smaugustus@dragonsforhire.com), and let’s turn this bank into a *fortress of finance!*

Warmly,
Smaugustus

items.description: Led and guarded a massive treasure hoard. Implemented flame-based security protocols and instilled terror-based asset protection strategies.
Learned the fundamentals of hoard aggregation and asset protection under the legendary dragon Infernious the Greedy.
Offered expert advice on hoard establishment and expansion. Specialized in vault security and incineration risk management.
Provided consultancy on maximizing asset security using traditional and, occasionally, fiery methods.
Assisted clients in identifying undervalued assets (jewels, gold, magical artifacts) and strategies for discreet acquisition.
Evaluated and stress-tested vault security systems. Any structural damage was purely incidental.
